text: I want to be notified via email or SMS when for some reason I am about to go overdrawn. I'd like it to forecast based on monthly in/outs.

user.description: Ruby/Rails dev, big databases, [No]SQL, cool programming languages, fishing, snowboarding
user.name: James Sadler

text: I don't want 'maintenance fees'. It's just a number in a fricking database occupying a few bytes of space. It costs *nothing*.
